title: Which Vorticon enemy do you think is deadliest?
content: I can't do more than 5 options, but I think I got all the worst ones.  (Although you'd be surprised at how many times a VortiKid has gotten the best of me!) [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-redeyes.gif[/img]

title: Re: Which Vorticon enemy do you think is deadliest?
content:
Vorticon Elite to me. They're most difficult to me because it's difficult to block their shots and they move fast and so on.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Which Vorticon enemy do you think is deadliest?
content: Vortican Elite for me too, they're fast, they shoot (so bonus over Ninjas), jump high and travel in packs.

title: Well...
content: I think the Elites on their own are more threatening, but they're often placed in locations that allow Keen to avoid direct confrontation with a little insight... The Vortininjas, on the other hand, are frequently placed in locations that offer no geographic advantage or shelter... They also take more shots to kill.  My vote goes to the Ninja.

title: Re: Well...
content:
I agree, ninjas all the way.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!

title: Re: Which Vorticon enemy do you think is deadliest?
content:
I vote for Vortininjas, as they tend to jump towards you in the less expected moment. On the other hand, Vorticon Elite guards can jump too, and shoot, but they're more predictable and avoidable, at least in their native (Keen 2 Vorticon Mothership) environment

And Vortininjas can jump even higher too.------------------------------
